text: @ImranKhanPTI UR GOVT IS NOT PROMOTING 20% STUDENTS DURING THIS PANDEMIC. HELP US & PROMOTE US. Taking special exams of only 20% students is unfair and injustice. Aren’t we prone to coronavirus? Our lives are also in danger #JusticeForCompositeStudents #CombineKoPromoteKaro #CancelSpecialExams

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
